name: Dark Odyssey (itch)
description:
EXTREMELY EARLY STAGE.

There is currently 0 gameplay at the moment. Setting up this page is motivating! I'd also wanted to ensure I had a method of distributing the game. Stay tuned for updates!

A sprawling, epic RPG... eventually.

Follow a troupe of four adventurers to the edges of the realm of Falra. Fight your way through desert fortresses, swamp witch covens, castles in bustling kingdoms.

You are Dexus, a famed Swordmaster having fought in The Zenedra War on behalf of the Queendom of Vilswene. Eight years of a nervous calm have passed since the war's end,  and soon a ceremony between the Queendom and The Empire of Morena -- aggressor of the now finished war -- will take place. Will the ceremony usher in a newfound era of peace, or are there darker machinations at work?

Queen Gwilla of Vilswene summons you, as one of her famed heroes of that war, to join three other famed combatants of your mighty Queendom to attend the ceremony alongside her. Answer her call, and see what awaits.
